response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily routine or professional endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be of great value to you. I am proposing to sell this product to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive benefits and services we provide with the purchase. I look forward to hearing your response and hope we can make this valuable addition to your life.", "product_price": 150}
